00037 #include "egs_gaussian_shape.h"
00038 #include "egs_input.h"
00039 #include "egs_functions.h"
00040 
00041 extern "C" {
00042 
00043     EGS_GAUSSIAN_SHAPE_EXPORT EGS_BaseShape *createShape(EGS_Input *input,
00044             EGS_ObjectFactory *f) {
00045         if (!input) {
00046             egsWarning("createShape(circle): null input?\n");
00047             return 0;
00048         }
00049         vector<EGS_Float> sigma;
00050         int err = input->getInput("sigma",sigma);
00051         if (err) {
00052             egsWarning("createShape(gaussian shape): no 'sigma' input\n");
00053             return 0;
00054         }
00055         EGS_Input *ishape = input->takeInputItem("shape",false);
00056         EGS_BaseShape *shape = 0;
00057         if (ishape) {
00058             shape = EGS_BaseShape::createShape(ishape);
00059             delete ishape;
00060         }
00061         if (!shape) {
00062             string shape_name;
00063             int err = input->getInput("shape name",shape_name);
00064             if (err) {
00065                 egsWarning("createShape(gaussian shape): no inline shape definition"
00066                            " and no 'shape name' keyword\n");
00067                 return 0;
00068             }
00069             shape = EGS_BaseShape::getShape(shape_name);
00070             if (!shape) {
00071                 egsWarning("createShape(gaussian shape): no shape named %s "
00072                            "exists\n",shape_name.c_str());
00073                 return 0;
00074             }
00075         }
00076         EGS_GaussianShape *s;
00077         if (sigma.size() == 1) {
00078             s = new EGS_GaussianShape(shape,sigma[0],0,0,"",f);
00079         }
00080         else if (sigma.size() == 2) {
00081             s = new EGS_GaussianShape(shape,sigma[0],sigma[1],0,"",f);
00082         }
00083         else {
00084             s = new EGS_GaussianShape(shape,sigma[0],sigma[1],sigma[2],"",f);
00085         }
00086         s->setName(input);
00087         s->setTransformation(input);
00088         return s;
00089     }
00090 
00091 }
